response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits tailored to your requirements.

I am offering you the chance to own this product for $900,000, a strategic price point that reflects its true worth while providing you with a substantial savings compared to its market value. This offer is exclusive to you and is intended to acknowledge your discerning taste and appreciation for quality.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I am confident that once you have the opportunity to experience the product firsthand, you will agree that it is truly worth every penny. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
